description.value:
Your kenku character has the following ancestral traits.

Age. Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

Size. Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weigh between 90 and 120 pounds. Your size is Medium.

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Expert Forgery. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.VuiwT8JxhafOHOjr]{Expert Forgery} You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. When you make an ability check to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects, you are considered proficient and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

Superb Recall. You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: Arcana, History, Nature, and Religion.

Mimicry. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.DCV05uy5H7d6ENV9]{Mimicry} You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check. You can speak only by using your Mimicry trait.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
